"Coastal Conservation":
"We've receieved reports from planet
Vopar of Shell Flowers abnormally
generating in the innermost area of the
Coast. The flowers seem to impact the
surrounding environment and cause
infection. ARKS are to destroy these
Shell flowers and disinfect the deepest
area as soon as possible.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Fail Shell Flower E-trial"
